name: React Router Starter Improvements
description: Update react-router-starter to be a comprehensive prototype starting point with best practices from reportory
goal: Create a best-practices starter template that can be quickly duplicated for prototype apps. Should demonstrate patterns for react-router, forms, testing, and Storybook that we use across Lambda Curry projects.
